backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, SOS events, hazards, and authorization‑gated CRUD with ID generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading manifest, icons, and main React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, start URL, theme colors, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Simple service worker implementing install-time caching, cache‑first fetch, and old cache cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, providers, service worker registration, sync manager, and SOS reconciliation.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: UI component showing online status, syncing, and queued offline actions with auth-aware messaging.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link with tracking.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive app header with navigation links, mobile sidebar menu, and auth bar.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout component that renders header, footer, connectivity indicator, SOS controller, crash dialog, and routed content.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthBar.tsx: Authentication UI that handles login/logout via Internet Identity and shows a user dropdown when logged in.
frontend/src/features/bluetooth/Bluetoot: UI card for connecting to a Bluetooth device, sending messages, viewing logs, and handling connection state and errors.
frontend/src/features/bluetooth/useBluet: Zustand-based hook managing Web Bluetooth connection state, message handling, error parsing, and device references.
frontend/src/features/contacts/contactsS: Zustand store and React Query logic for managing emergency contacts locally or via backend depending on authentication state.
frontend/src/features/fatigue/FatigueChe: Dialog prompting the user for a fatigue check based on periodic triggers from useFatiguePrompts.
frontend/src/features/fatigue/useFatigue: Hook that triggers periodic fatigue checks based on user settings and session timing.
frontend/src/features/hazards/HazardRepo: Form component for submitting hazard reports with type, severity, description, and current location, enqueueing submissions for offline handling.
frontend/src/features/hazards/HazardsLis: Displays nearby hazards with filtering by radius, using fetched hazard data and showing details like type, severity, location, and time.
frontend/src/features/hazards/hazardType: Defines hazard type and severity constants and helper functions to map values to display labels.
frontend/src/features/hazards/useNearbyH: Hook that fetches hazards near the user’s location via an actor, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/features/location/LastKnown: Card component showing the user’s last known location or location access errors.
frontend/src/features/location/useBreadc: Provides live geolocation tracking and optionally records breadcrumb points during an active SOS event.
frontend/src/features/permissions/usePer: Hook for checking and requesting location and motion permissions with real-time state updates.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name and optional handle.
frontend/src/features/profile/useUserPro: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via actor calls with React Query.
frontend/src/features/sensors/CrashPromp: Dialog triggered by crash detection that prompts the user to confirm safety or start an SOS event.
frontend/src/features/sensors/useCrashDe: Hook that listens to device motion, computes g‑force, and triggers a crash callback when threshold conditions are met with cooldown handling.
frontend/src/features/sos/shareLink.ts: Generates a shareable SOS status URL from an SOS ID.
frontend/src/features/sos/sosBluetoothMe: Formats an SOS event into a human‑readable Bluetooth message including note, timestamp, and optional share link.
UI controller for starting, ending, sharing, and Bluetooth‑relaying SOS events with dialogs, identity checks, and status badges.
frontend/src/features/sos/sosState.ts: Zustand store managing active SOS state and async helpers to enqueue start/end/breadcrumb actions for offline processing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Hook that tracks browser online/offline status via window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing; queries handled elsewhere.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Main entry rendering the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/offline/queue.ts: IndexedDB‑backed queue system for storing and updating offline SOS‑related actions with status and retry tracking.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: Manages offline queue syncing by periodically sending queued SOS and hazard actions to the backend and updating shared sync state.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Provides a UI for viewing, adding, editing, and deleting emergency contacts using a modal form.
frontend/src/pages/HazardsPage.tsx: Displays tabs for submitting hazard reports and viewing nearby hazards.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the app’s home dashboard with SOS status, safety features, and last known location.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows users to configure safety settings, permissions, and view queued offline items.
frontend/src/pages/SOSStatusPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed status information for a specific SOS event including breadcrumbs and timestamps.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA functionality.
frontend/src/state/settingsStore.ts: Zustand store for persisted user settings with validation for crash threshold values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues for an offline-first SOS mobile app.
